definition[0]: preferential treatment, rates etc are deliberately different in order to give an advantage to particular people
example[0]: preferential credit terms for reliable borrowers
definition[1]: preferential treatment, a preferential rate etc is deliberately more favourable in order to give an advantage to particular people, organizations etc
example[1]: Norway develops domestic oil companies by giving them preferential treatment in awarding oil-field licenses.
example[2]: If you find you need to borrow more, weâ€™ll charge you a special preferential rate.
